Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْأَعْمَالِ مَا أُكْرِهَتِ النُّفُوسُ عَلَيْهَا
enWisdom: The best of deeds is that which people compel themselves to do
The best of actions is restraining oneself from evil
The best of actions is espousing the truth

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْأَفْعَالِ مَا وَافَقَ الْحَقَّ وَأَفْضَلُ الْمَقَالِ مَا طَابَقَ الصِّدْقَ
enWisdom: The best of actions is that which corresponds to the truth, and the best speech is that which matches with the facts
The best of your deeds are those that fulfil your duty
The best of actions is that which earns gratitude

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأُمُورِ مَا أَدَّى إِلَى الْخَلَاصِ
enWisdom: The best matters are those which lead to deliverance [from hellfire]
The best of actions is that which rectifies the faith
The best of deeds is that which is adorned by kindness
The best of actions is that which fulfils the requirements

Wisdom: خَيْرُ عَمَلِكَ مَا أَصْلَحْتَ بِهِ يَوْمَكَ وَشَرُّهُ مَا اسْتَفْسَدْتَ بِهِ قَوْمَكَ
enWisdom: Your best action is that by which you improve your day [of reckoning] and the worst [of your actions] is that by which you corrupt your community
The best action is maintaining a balance between hope and fear

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْأَعْمَالِ مَا أَوْجَبَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَنْجَى مِنَ النَّارِ
enWisdom: From the best actions is that which leads to Paradise and saves from hellfire
There is no action like verification

Wisdom: لَا يَقِلُّ عَمَلٌ مَعَ تَقْوَى وَكَيْفَ يَقِلُّ مَا يُتَقَبَّلُ
enWisdom: Action with God-wariness is never little, and how can something that is accepted [by Allah] be [considered] little!

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي عَمَلٍ إِلَّا مَعَ الْيَقِينِ وَالْوَرَعِ
enWisdom: There is no good in an act except with certitude and piety
